game.title: Rescue the Lost Princess
game.objective: Rescue the lost princess from the Dark Fortress
game.description: The princess has been captured by the dark forces and is held captive in the Dark Fortress. Your mission is to infiltrate the fortress and rescue her.

task.description: Travel through the Haunted Forest and reach the outskirts of the Dark Fortress
Find a way to enter the fortress without being detected
Lead the princess out of the fortress and make your escape
